subSubSection.paragraph: 101 species are included in this genus from Latin America.

Neotrochus
of the West Indies); Irmler 1982b: 380 (Neotropical species); Irmler 1987: 81 (Neotropical species); Irmler 2005c: 11 (species of

subSubSection.paragraph: 20 species are known from and are restricted to South America. Characters/Description: Irmler 1981a: 144 (characters in key); Irmler 2010b: 368 (characters in key); Irmler 2015a: 176 (characters in key). Distribution. South America: French Guiana , Peru , Bolivia , Brazil , Paraguay . Other regions: Palaearctic [in doubt].
